dc_title_s: Persia sive sophorum regnum; Guilielmus Blaeu.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes decorative cartouche with ill. of local peoples. From Blaeu's "Tooneel des Aerdrycx ost Nievwe atlas". Dedicated to Theodorus Tholing. From the Vignaud collection. Printer's mark on verso "I 9". 1 map: hand col.; 37 x 48 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
